gurmukhi: ਪੂਰਨ ਬ੍ਹਮ ਧਿਅਾਨ ਪੂਰਨ ਬ੍ਹਮ ਗਿਅਾਨ ਪੂਰਨ ਭਗਤਿ ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ੳੁਪਦੇਸ ਹੈ
transliteration: Pooran Braham Dhiaan Pooran Braham Giaana , Pooran Bhagati Satigur Oupadays Hai ?
translation: Satguru's sermon (in the form of blessing of Naam) is complete contemplation of the Master Lord, His knowledge and is total worship.

gurmukhi: ਜੈਸੇ ਜਲ ਅਾਪਾ ਖੋੲਿ ਬਰਨ ਬਰਨ ਮਿਲੈ ਤੈਸੇ ਹੀ ਬਿਬੇਕੀ ਪਰਮਾਤਮ ਪ੍ਵੇਸ ਹੈ
transliteration: Jaisay Jal Aapaa Khoi Baran Baran Milai , Taisay Hee Bibaykee Paramaatam Pravays Hai ?
translation: As water mixes with several colours and acquires the same hue, similarly a disciple following Guru's advice becomes one with God.

gurmukhi: ਪਾਰਸ ਪਰਸਿ ਜੈਸੇ ਕਨਿਕ ਅਨਿਕ ਧਾਤੁ ਚੰਦਨ ਬਨਾਸਪਤੀ ਬਾਸਨਾ ਅਵੇਸ ਹੈ
transliteration: Paaras Parasi Jaisay Kanik Anik Dhaatu , Chandan Banaasapatee Baasanaa Avays Hai ?
translation: As many metals when touched with philosopher stone become gold, bushes and plants grown in the vicinity of sandalwood attain its fragrance, similarly a devotee following Guru's advice becomes pure and one who spreads the fragrance of goodness all around.

gurmukhi: ਘਟਿ ਘਟਿ ਪੂਰਮ ਬ੍ਹਮ ਜੋਤਿ ਓਤਿ ਪੋਤਿ ਭਾਵਨੀ ਭਗਤਿ ਭਾੲਿ ਅਾਦਿ ਕੳੁ ਅਦੇਸ ਹੈ ॥੧੩੩॥
transliteration: Ghati Ghati Pooram Braham Joti Aoti Poti , Bhaavanee Bhagati Bhaai Aadi Kau Adays Hai ?133?
translation: Making prayers and supplications to the Almighty Lord, a wise and rationalist person enjoins the divine radiance of the Omnipresent Lord like warp and weft of a fabric through complete faith and devotion instilled in him by the Guru. (133)
